bibl.title: Manichaeism and Gnosticism in the Papyri.
bibl.note: The Gnostic Writings from Nag Hammadi, Oxyrhynchus, and the Area of Panopolis. - Manichaeism in Egypt: The Cologne Mani Codex; - The Manichaean Codices from Medinet Madi (Fayyum) and the Private Documents from Upper Egypt and the Oases.
RÖMER Cornelia, Manichaeism and Gnosticism in the Papyri.
R.S. BAGNALL (Ed.), The Oxford Handbook of Papyrology (Oxford, 2009) pp. 623-643, 6 figg.
